entities.name: lucius
entities.description: Lucius is a character who shouted and strided around the bound prisoners to face Ron. He is mentioned as 'It's them, Potter's friends'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends, mentioned by Lucius.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is another one of Harry's friends, mentioned by Lucius.

entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: Arthur Weasley is Draco's father, mentioned by Lucius.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a character who is being referred to as 'Potter' by Lucius.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends, mentioned by Bellatrix Lestrange.

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: Bellatrix Lestrange is a character who walked around the prisoners and stared at Hermione.

entities.name: cissy
entities.description: Cissy is likely a nickname for someone, possibly a family member or friend of Bellatrix's, mentioned by her when she enters the room.
